Package cn.crowdos.kernel.constraint

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Condition  
    Constraint
    In Mobile CrowdSensing (MCS), there are a lots of constraints.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Coordinate  
    DateDeadline
    A constraint that represents a deadline in the form of a LocalDate.
    DateInterval
    A constraint that represents a date interval between a start date and an end date.
    DecomposeSpatioLine
    The DecomposeSpatioLine class is responsible for decomposing a set of coordinates into a list of SpatioLines.
    DependenceConstraint
    Dependence Constraint
    IndecomposableDecomposerGenerator
    In Mobile CrowdSensing (MCS), there are a lots of constraints, which vary in type.For decomposable constraints, e.g. do something on a certain date in a certain year.This can be broken down into specific temporal and spatial constraints.In addition, there are a number of non-decomposable constraints.For this, We use reflection to return the indecomposable constraint decomposer generator we need by getting the Class object of the class created by the upper level developer.
    NoneCondition  
    POIConstraint  
    SimpleTimeConstraint
    Simple TIme Constraint
    SpatioLine
    The SpatioLine class represents a line in a 2D coordinate system with a given width.
    SpatioPoint
    A spatial constraint that defines a circular region around a center point with a given radius.
    SpatioPolygon
    A SpatioPolygon class represents a polygon in a two-dimensional space.
    SpatioRectangular  
    TemporalInterval
    TemporalInterval constraint
    TemporalPoint
    TemporalPoint Constraint
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidConstraintException
    Thrown to indicate that Constrain is not reasonable or can not be satisfied.
